actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Reform Act of 1974 in order to make eligible under the adjustment assistance program certain workers who did not receive timely notification of requirements relating to such program.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to make eligible for the trade adjustment assistance programs workers who filed for such assistance before April 4, 1976, and who did not receive timely notification of the program requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Reform Act of 1974 in order to make eligible under the adjustment assistance program certain workers who did not receive timely notification of requirements relating to such program.
